name: Living Shade
description: The Living Shade is a medium-sized fey creature that blends seamlessly into shadows, characterized by its stealthy nature and ability to navigate tight spaces with ease.
memorable: Its ability to become almost invisible in dim light makes it a dangerous ambusher, while its vulnerability to radiant damage creates a unique tactical challenge.
goals: To ambush and evade opponents, often lurking in dark environments.
relations: May be encountered with other fey creatures or dark entities that utilize stealth.
environment: Typically found in dimly lit areas or shadowy environments.
strengths: High stealth abilities and immunity to many conditions make it a difficult foe to confront directly.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, and its effectiveness diminishes in bright sunlight.
attacks: Shadow Touch - a melee attack dealing cold damage, targeting nearby foes with a decent hit modifier.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Stealth - allows it to hide as a bonus action in dim light or darkness.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, enabling it to see in dark or dim conditions.
skills: Excels in stealth with a proficiency modifier of +6, making it hard to detect.
additional_information: Amorphous ability allows movement through narrow spaces without squeezing.
Immunities to necrotic and poison damage enhance its survivability.
Condition immunities make it resilient against various combat effects.
Disadvantage in sunlight heavily restricts its combat effectiveness.
Cold damage from its attacks can be significant against certain enemies.
test_queries: creature that thrives in dim light
elusive fey with cold damage attacks
